price: الله پر خپلو بندګانو ډېر مهربانه دى، چاته يې چې خوښه شي روزي وركوي او همغه زورور برلاسى دى.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
